content:
Yes, guided tours are available for both Gunung Jerai and Ulu Muda Eco Park. 

For Gunung Jerai, there are several tour operators offering guided hikes that cater to different fitness levels and experience. Some of the tours also include a visit to nearby attractions such as Beris Dam and Muzium Padi.

For Ulu Muda Eco Park, visitors can arrange guided tours with the state's Forestry Department or hire a tour guide from the nearby village of Lubuk Bongor. The park offers a range of activities such as jungle trekking, bird watching, and river cruises, which are all best experienced with a local guide.

It is recommended to book your tours in advance to ensure availability, especially during peak travel seasons. Visitors should also check with the tour operators regarding the necessary permits and safety precautions before embarking on any tour.
